resources.string: The part of human brain responsible for recognizing words is different from the part responsible for telling colors, shapes, faces ...\n While playing this game, you have to use multiple parts of your brain simultaneously, and you also need to be very concentrated if you want make a high score.

SCORE : %1$d POINTS

 %2$d decisions in %3$d secs

 On average,
 %4$.1f decisions per sec
 %5$.1f secs per decision.

Do you know the app called Brain Benchmark?

 It can test your power of concentration and the speed of your brain coordinating its different parts.
I just got %1$d points while playing %2$s in Brain Benchmark. \n\nCan you do better than me?

© Brain Benchmark (v1.0)

 Welcome any feedback, suggestions and cooperation opportunities

 PS: the comments for your scores is just for fun. Please don't take it seriously

 zheng.zander.hsu@gmail.com
Determine if the word truly matches its font color.
Determine if the word truly matches the shape left beside it.
Determine if the name truly matches the portrait image left beside it.
The test will last for only 60 secs. If you are wrong one time then the test will terminate, So please be concentrated and don\'t rush. Good Luck!
Your brain are approaching or exceeding human limits!Please don\'t leave earth. Earth need you!
Terrific! Different parts of your brain can cowork very well and you have a awesome power of concentration!
Not bad! You didn\'t hinder the progress of human evolution too much
Not very well...have you pushed the pedal to the metal? Or maybe it\'s because the oil for your brain running smoothly was mixed with water somehow
Don\'t rush. For the time being your brain\'s decision accuracy haven\'t been able to catch up its running speed yet
Hmm... It seems that the connections between the different parts of your brain is a little bit too weak, or some connections shouldn\'t exist at all
